channel.title: Castlewars Troubles [DELTA_Source]
channel.description:
I'm working on a castlewars... because castlewars and dueling are my favourite all time minigames Anyway I have [b]::cwars[/b] Then The zammy and sara portals take you to each end of castlewars , and when you click on portal they give you castlewars cloak and hood , As it should.. But I am stook with making the actually [b]playerVplayer[/b] part, where you don't loose items I understand there is pits on deltascape but I can't seem to use the same method for castlewars
Please Help,
-Waves, [b]eXtrosion[/b]
--Screenies-- [IMG]http://i37.tinypic.com/9h5lsh.png[/img] [IMG]http://i37.tinypic.com/5555e1.png[/img]

item.title: Castlewars Troubles [DELTA_Source]
item.dc:creator: @adog17x adog17x
item.description:
@adog17x wrote:

public boolean inCastleWars() { if((absX >= 2366 && absX <= 2431 && absY >= 3071 && absY <=3137) || (absX >= 2354 && absX <= 2410 && absY >= 9497 && absY <=9545) || (absX >= 2395 && absX <= 2435 && absY >= 9474 && absY <=9511)) return true; else return false; } public boolean inZamorak() { if (absX >= 2411 && absX <= 2429 && absY >= 9514 && absY <=9533) { return true; } else { return false; } } public boolean inSaradomin() { if (absX >= 2370 && absX <= 2391 && absY >= 9482 && absY <=9496) { return true; } else { return false; } }

you should know were to put that

and idk how the applydead works for delta

so like im guessing

if(inCastleWars) { actionTimer = 0; ResetAttack(); ResetAttackNPC(); pEmote = ServerCP.Deathemote; IsDeadTimer = true; SpECS(); frame1(); // Xerozcheez: Resets animation updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; NewHP = getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]); setSkillLevel(3, getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]), playerXP[playerHitpoints]); playerLevel[3] = getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]); refreshSkills(); PoisonDelay = 9999999; EntangleDelay = 0; teleportToX = ServerCP.DeathX; teleportToY = ServerCP.DeathY; sendMessage("Oh dear you died!"); updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; }

if(inCastleWars()){ toX = 2441; toY = 3090; heightLevel = 0; } if(playerEquipment[playerCape] == 4514 ||playerEquipment[playerCape] == 4516){ playerEquipment[playerCape] = -1; }

fhsfh w.e lol
